title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.13.0.2 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2019-7-11 17:28 编辑 

测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft 基岩版 1.13 仍未发布，1.13.0.2为其第2个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。


Fixes:bug修复
修复了51个bug
（此版本没有任何内容更新，仅是修复bug）Crashes/Performance崩溃/性能方面
Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay修复了游玩时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur while downloading multiple marketplace items at the same time on some iOS devices修复了在某些IOS设备上一起下载多个市场物品时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a drop in performance when flying with elytra in The End修复了使用鞘翅在末地飞行时性能下降的问题Fixed a crash that could occur when Villagers tried to pathfind修复了村民寻路时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur when exiting the game after a multiplayer session修复了在退出多人游戏会话后可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur when trying to join a server修复了在尝试加入服务器时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur when using a Phantom spawn egg on a mob spawner block修复了在刷怪笼方块上使用幻翼刷怪蛋时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur when loading in Ocean Monuments修复了加载海底遗迹时可能发生的崩溃问题

General通用/常规
Corrected the arm movement on Oculus Rift immersive mode在Oculus Rift的沉浸模式下，手臂现在会正常地摆动Fixed various text to speech reader issues修复文本到语音阅读器的问题Chat instructions no longer appear on screen each time the player travels through a portal (MCPE-45073)当玩家通过传送门时，不会再屏幕上显示聊天说明Fixed the spacing of some of the menu buttons修复了一些按钮的间隔大小Fixed sneaking while sleeping bug修复了睡觉时仍然保持潜行的问题Fixed the positioning of several held items修复了用手拿着几个物品位置会鬼畜的问题Fixed the hand placement for various Marketplace skins when holding an item修复了使用各种市场皮肤手持物品时手部位置鬼畜的问题Structure block wireframe toggle now properly hides and shows the wireframe结构方块的隐藏/显示方块边缘线框架现在会正确地工作Fixed zombie pigman sword position修复了僵尸猪人持剑的剑的位置Fixed camera position when the player sleeps修复了玩家睡觉时相机位置的不对Fixed elytra position for Marketplace skins that don’t use the standard humanoid model修复了市场皮肤使用鞘翅时无法切换使用到标准人性模型的问题Structure block load mode now has include entities and remove blocks options结构方块的加载模式现在可以包含实体，以及移除了方块选项Players no longer lose items when moving stacks of items into a cartography table当玩家拖动物品到制图台并卡住的情况下，物品不会再丢失Fixed some text characters with accents showing up as spaces instead (MCPE-47908)修复了一些重音音节文本字符的问题Fixed hand position when switching from item to bare hand in first person修复了在第一人称时将物品切换到空手时手的位置不正确的问题Adjusted position of player arms while holding maps for certain Marketplace skins with short and long arms调整玩家拿着地图时手臂的位置，同时处理好了某些市场皮肤短臂和长臂的问题Fixed an issue where using Education Edition in a world would also change the menus and options (MCPE-47952)修复了在一个世界中使用教育版模式会自动更改菜单和选项的问题

Gameplay游玩
Fixed issues related to unloaded chunks that could appear in Realms and Local worlds  (REALMS-1553)修复了可能出现在Realms和本地世界出现的区块卸载崩溃问题Fixed an issue where the player could get stuck in the loading screen when trying to join a world or use a nether portal (MCPE-44816)修复了玩家在加入世界或者使用下界传送门时卡在加载界面的问题Leaves collected with silk touch now stack correctly with other leaves of the same type (MCPE-32347)用精准采集收集的叶子现在会与其他同类叶子正确堆叠Parrots now sit correctly on a player's shoulder when passing by当玩家经过某些地方，鹦鹉可能会落在他们的肩膀上Jukeboxes now stop playing music after being broken唱片机被破坏后会停止播放音乐Wither health bar no longer disappears during the fight if the player moves away (MCPE-40881)玩家离凋灵太远的话，凋灵的血量条会消失Fixed the default recipe for beds修复了床的默认制作方式Joining a Realm through the 'joinable friends' list now loads the Realms UI rather than the normal multiplayer UI (MCPE-47731)通过“可加入的好友”列表加入Realm时，现在会使用Realms UI而不是普通的多人游戏UIEating when using a nether portal can cause the player to teleport to a random location (MCPE-39147)
使用下界传送门+同时进食会导致玩家进行随机传送

Mobs怪物
Foxes no longer run away from players that are sneaking狐狸不会在玩家潜行时逃跑Foxes no longer run away instead of being tempted狐狸在受到引诱时不会在逃跑Foxes now move at the same speed in Bedrock and Java狐狸现在在Java版和基岩版中拥有同样的移动速度Added back the blue effect from Charged Creeper to Wither shield将高压爬行者（闪电苦力怕）的蓝色效果同时应用到凋零防御时的效果Foxes are no longer tempted by the player holding food狐狸不会再受到拿着食物的玩家的诱惑Breeding two red Foxes in a snowy biome now makes a red Fox baby在雪原生物群系中养的两只红狐狸现在会生= =Fixed Fox nap goal cooldown修复了狐狸睡觉的冷却时间Foxes no longer drown themselves while trying to catch and eat fish狐狸在尝试捕鱼和吃鱼时不会再淹死自己Villagers can now reach their job sites correctly (MCPE-47884)村民现在会正确地到达他们的工作地点Trusted Foxes now correctly lose aggro after getting revenge受信任的狐狸现在在复仇后会失去仇恨值

Blocks方块
Horizontal wood blocks now drop the correct version of block水平木头方块现在会正确掉落方块版本TNT can now crafted from red sand as well as normal sandTNT现在可以同时用沙子和红沙制作

User Interface用户界面
Fixed duplicated 'Sign In' messages that were overlapping修复了重叠在一起的又一个“登录”信息Removed duplicated download progress bar删除了多余的下载进度条

Add-Ons and Script Engine附加包和脚本引擎
Blocks no longer stutter while falling when a script uses getBlocks当脚本使用getBlocks函数时，方块在下降时不再会卡住Scripting: Ticking areas now have a property showing whether they are fully loaded or not脚本：计时区域现在有一个属性以显示它们是否已经到时Custom rideable entities now show the correct action hint when added自定义可骑乘实体在添加时会正确的显示操作提示信息
